title: The Elder Scroll : Arena (Mac OS X DosboxApp)
description:
This is the game "The Elder Scrolls : Arena" from Bethesda Softworks, 1994.
As it is now a free game I decided to create a ready to run application for Mac, using user fak-it special Dosbox version (like in brukerdose's releases).

DESCRIPTION:
============
The Elder Scrolls: Arena is the first game in the Elder Scrolls series. It is a first-person computer role-playing game for MS-DOS, developed by Bethesda Softworks and released in 1994.
Like its sequels, Arena takes place in the continent of Tamriel, complete with wilderness, dungeons, and a spell creation system that allows players to mix various spell effects into a new spell as long as they have the money to pay for it.


HOW TO PLAY:
============
Just unzip and double-click the app. Can't be easier.

LEGAL:
======
This game is free, so I don't think it makes any arm to anyone to release this Mac version.
